values: So I started to keep a new journal on wordpress because it's fancy. I really haven't figured out all of its fanciness yet but someday I will.  I might still update this one every once in a while but if you want to check out the new one its at http://www.cottoncupcakes.com

cat bed, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

well well chirstmas is over. I had a good time. I didn't get much done today because I have a freaking cold and felt crappy. I basically laid around watching movies all day. I rented the descent which I really enjoyed. I even jumped a few times. I'm hoping to be more productive tomorrow I had such big plans for this vacation and so far I've all I've done is watch movies and eat cookies.

goal for tomorrow: do stuff

I think it is pretty funny when dogs dream and make the strange muffled barking noise. My oh my I ate so much food tonight. Cheesecake with strawberries, asparagus wrapped in salmon, ham, potatoes, and too many glasses of wine. I was tired all night but now I can't get to sleep. My christmas has been wonderful except for the fact that my dog has terrible gas and is sleeping inches from me at the moment.

Guinea pig pouch, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

My back is killing me. I really need to buy some sort of work table in the near future. My current method is a giant piece of plywood on my bed and it is not so good. I had a pretty good day, I made cookies with my mom. It still doesn't feel like the holidays yet but maybe this week when I attend multiple christmas assemblies and parties at school. I'm feeling a little down tonight I don't think I should have watch Hotel Rwanda. : [

I can't wait for everything to change. I need change right now.

Ruler pouch, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

Things have been good good good lately. I am have been watching way too many movies and episodes of Veronica Mars. Which is one crazy TV show.

I got the zippers I ordered today so I have been sewing them all into brand new bags. I am almost done christmas shopping. This is the earliest I think I've never finished. I need to get some wrapping paper and try constructing bows out of old plastic bags. I think it might be harder than the instructions let on.

goals for tomorrow are as follows

+ make it to post office before noon
+ bake cookies
+ buy flannel
+ sew a zipper into a newly sewn jumper

I think an amish woman somewhere might have the same goal list as me.

Vintage dot wristlet, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

Tomorrow I get to eat Thanksgiving at work. After work I get to start a 5 day vacation!! I am super excited to spend my time sewing. Life has been really good lately. I'm looking forward to Thanksgiving dinner this year. Jellied cranberries are my favorite part of the whole deal.

My work has been kind of fun lately. I got to watch an awesome 3rd grade play about Thanksgiving and today was a magic show that taught morals. Can't get better than that. : ]
Tomorrow I plan to knit a new hat. Oo la la.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v2g31xjdfhQ


The new etsy is up and running

Ernie the Cupcake, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

I think I am getting sick. : [

I'm at work right now and I feel terrible. I really need some tea or a slushie. My throat is killing me. I was so proud I had been able to avoid sickness. I wish my town had a jamba juice. Maybe I'll buy some sort of super vitamin C filled drink on my break. I made some pouches last night because I was super excited to sew in my new tags. They look pretty good, I'll post a photo later.

Handmade Arcade Table, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

Last weekend was Handmade Arcade. It was a good time. The place was very crowded. I got a chance to look around a bit at the end of the day. I bought a encylopedia destructica book and lots of delicious cupcakes.I wish I had one of those cupcakes right now. I don't have to go to school tomorrow. : ]

strawberry pouch, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

I can't believe it is November already. Time seems to be flying by lately. Since the weather was nice yesterday I went to Greenwood. The pond there was really low and surrounded by mud. We walked out on the pier and I threw stones into the deep mud. They made the coolest noise when they hit. My friend and I had a contest to make the biggest mud splash. We also climbed down into the damn and sat for awhile.

Tonight I went down to Kish park. I love walking past all the sleeping ducks just floating on the surface with their heads tucked in. I have been sewing and painting like crazy lately. Oh and cleaning my room. I'm trying to get rid of stuff. I really need to downsize all the crap I own. It is just too much. The only thing I can't seem to part with at all is my books.

penn state, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

This guy loves penn state and fountain drinks.

I had a fun weekend. I went to Jason's Woods which was pretty awesome. It had a 3D haunted house and a hayride with fire explosions and an impaled elves. Sunday my sister and eric came down to hang out and eat the biggest dinner ever. Today I got to sleep in super late and play uno at work. It felt like winter today and I didn't like it. I want fall weather to last a bit longer.

Uranus is a funny word, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

I got paid today. :]

I bought some new fabric and felt. Tomrrow I plan to sleep in super late, make homemade rice krispies, and sew like crazy.

perfect.

Awesome, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

I have been so sleepy lately.

This website is great http://www.freecycle.org

I hate throwing stuff away. My teeny tiny county even has one.

lying pumpkins, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

Reason #1 not to make stuff while wearing the only pair of dress pants you enjoy wearing to work.

SUPER GLUE

Today I left work early and drove around for a bit. I love this time of year. I am not really looking forward to winter but I do enjoy that feeling on winter nights when it is so cold that it hurts your lungs to take a deep breath. So I filled my evening making stuff. My hands are currently covered with super glue and felt fuzz. haha. I made some felt weiner dog pins and a few totes. I still have a bright yellow tote that I have to finish and oh so many zip pouches to create. I'm so glad tomorrow is Wednesday. Its weird when time seems to be flying by but at the same time you can't wait for the next moment to pass.

bitten donut, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

I hate the word blog. Who came up with that one?

I have been waiting for what seems like forever for the mail to get here. I went to goodwill today in search of a sweater vest but didn't have much luck. I did however find some good stuff.

I want to go on a hike this weekend. The leaves are looking so beautiful.

Hey, It's the Butt Ugly Gang!, originally uploaded by Fannee Doolee.

woah.

sheep tote, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

I spun some yarn today in pretty fall colors. I also knitted until I got a cramp in my right hand. I wish I had a giant studio so I could felt things. It seems too messy for a bedroom. I can't wait for it to be the weekend. I do not enjoy working very much, it takes up so much time. I wish I could just spend my days sewing and knitting and be paid for it.

I spent an hour looking at this flickr group about craft books.
http://www.flickr.com/groups/craftbooks/pool/

my journal entried are thrilling.

New stickers, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

Today I got an unexpected day off from work which was good and bad. I drove to Selingsgrove with my mom and grandmother to pick up my new glasses. I ate a huge sundae at Friendly's that contained a blondie brownie soooo good. Tomorrow I am going to sew sew sew oh and go to a boring work meeting.

<object width="425" height="350"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/4NBArHgZntE"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/4NBArHgZntE" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" width="425" height="350"></embed></object>


Sometimes it is difficult to pretend to be an adult around kids and not laugh when they call each other wankers.

wrinkled shopping bag, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

I ate the biggest chocolate covered banana today. It was sooo good. I went to Lenscrafters today and bought new glasses. I really like them. I hope they don't look terrible when I get them back because of my super thick lenses. I paid extra to get the extra thin fancy lenses.

I made some shopping bags today which I hope to take to stores with me so I don't have to use plastic bags anymore. I also made some homemade cleaning products to use to clean wiggy's cage.

I wish I could visit the playboy mansion all those animals, pools, and boobs look like fun.

I've been forcing myself to read the news everyday. It is difficult because it is so depressing to learn about some things happening and feel so helpless. I guess it is better to face it though than to ignore it. I tend to read http://www.commondreams.org or google news. Does anyone have a better site they read to get their news?

puzzle love match, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

I have a crush on Zooey Deschanel. She is so cute. It seems to be raining a lot lately which I like. The woods by my house smells like damp leaves. Only 4 more days of training at work. Thank goodness. Training is so completely dull. I might even be able to get out of the last day of CPR since I just got all that coverage. Thats about all that is new. I sewed a lot tonight and went for a long walk.

zip pouches galore, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

Today I started my new job. The day started with a packet of papers about 4 inches thick. I don't think I've signed my name so many times in one day before. Doesn't seem so bad yet except for the fact that the only day of the week I'm allowed to wear jeans is Friday. I suppose I will need to buy some other sort of pant considering I only own 2 pairs that aren't jeans and they are too large. So I am going to purchase some causal business attire tomorrow. haha. I packaged orders tonight and watched a movie.

I wish I could go to sleep right now but I'm wide awake for the first time all day. I need to stop drinking tea at night.

new, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

I love to listen to french music. That is almost the only thing I listen to anymore. I am almost constantly listening to my ipod. I really need to get a smaller one. Maybe the mini one cause I don't think the nano would be enough. The one I have now weighs my pants down.
I made bags for an order today. My life is pretty boring but I like it just the same.

Highlights of my week:

* perfect tomato and basil pizza
*little miss sunshine
*finishing so many things I have put off
*last week at work
*getting any unexpected day off
*motorcycle ride at night
*finding the best red sweatshirt

yarn, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

This is the first year ever that I think I am excited for it to be fall. I usually love warm weather but I am getting excited to have to use scarves again and be able to drink tea without breaking a sweat. I have already start to spin wool and knit in preparation. I was at the sewing machine for at least 4 or 5 hours today. My back is killing me now but I have bags to make! I ordered 50 new zippers today. I also painted a table my dad made for me. I will take a photo once the second coat is on. I made brownies from scratch as well so gooey and delicious. I just finished watching Everything is illuminated with my grandmother. I enjoyd it.

I love days off.

fabric, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

I am having a wonderful weekend so far and I still have 2 whole days to go. I only have about 9 or 10 days left working at my old job and then I start my new one on September 11th. I really hope I like it. I have so much I want to get done tomorrow. I need to buy some wool and a book about sideshows for an embroidery project I'm working on right now. I don't know why I am fascinated by sideshows but I am. I just read Geek Love again recently so maybe that is it.

little miss strawberry, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

I haven't been updating very often or taking any photos. :[

This week I went to the belleville sale with bethany which is always a good time. I got an owl necklace and a horse bracelet. Bethany bought a new kitchen table that I think she might leave scott for and run away with it.
Things have been busy lately and time seems to be going by way too fast. I still have so much to prepare for school. It is making me nervous. I hope I can get it all done in time. I think I am going to go mini golfing and hopefully see a movie this weekend.
snakes_on_a_plane, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

For the first time in a few weeks I had a really good day and was happy. I feel really good today. I went on a hike in the woods and played with my dogs in a giant pile of sand. I got a huge bugbite on my nose. I made cupcakes. I tried to get my hair cut but all the walk in places were booked so maybe I can go on a weekday. I also got to meet the new dog I will be pet sitting next week. It weighs 3lbs and has mini everything, needless to say I am in love with it completely. I am thinking of sewing a new shirt tonight. I got some great yellow fabric and I don't want to mess it up because I am a little tired. I have been obsessed with yellow lately. I am also thinking pretty seriously about using some of my first paycheck to get a tattoo. I have wanted another one for some long. I got my first one seven years ago! I already drew out a design and I'm getting excited.
I feel a little like this today. I hope it gets better soon.

blue roses, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

I finally got all of those things you put off forever done today. The laundry,cleaning, and buying boring things like bags and guinea pig food. I'm hungry for a poptart.

new sewing machine, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

I went and got my new sewing machine today. I love it! The guy in the store gave me an hour long demo on how to work a few things but there is so much I have to learn about.

It has been raining all day. Our yard is a giant mud pit. I can't believe it is almost July. This summer is going by quickly.

light box photo, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

This weekend was fun except for being exhausted and other illnesses. I spent most of my weekend sleeping. Helped James clean his room and we went canoeing and played frisbee.

I spent most of today in bed watching Grey's Anatomy because I am obcessed with it and james made me cds of season 2. It is an addicting show when you don't have the energy to get up. Hopefully tomorrow I can get some sewing done and make it to the post office before I fall asleep.

orange wristlet, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

I think I just scratched my eye. It is burning like crazy and I should probably remove my contact but then I would be half blind.

I just ordered some new 7" zippers with paypal money so I can make more bags. I'm always amazed how much cheaper it is to buy supplies wholesale. I need to find a wool felt wholesale dealer. I really need to put all the fabric to use.

I spent an hour this moring looking at this website www.kitty-craft.com. I wish you could get craft books like this in the united states.

green roses, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

Today I drove to Allensville to look at fancy schmancy sewing machines and was impressed but all of them. I can't wait to make more clothes. On the way back my mom and grammie wanted to stop at a shop and I went into an antiques shop to look around. They had tons of vintage fabrics and buttons. I wanted to buy them all but only got this green roses because well I don't have any money. ha. I can't wait to go back with my first paycheck. Tomorrow I am going to get up and go to the farmers maket and then it is off to Indiana.

orange clutch, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

I might buy a new sewing machine tomorrow. soooooo excited. I have been staying up way too late and sleeping in. I hope it doesn't rain this weekend because I really want to go to the drive in and canoe at yellow creek.

Dot bag, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

I've been sewing a lot lately. I'm going to make cupcakes today. Chai tea cupcakes. Yummy.

owlshoes, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

I really wish I could afford these shoes because they are super. I had a fun weekend. Ate way too much junk food but all in all it was a good time.

pink polka dot top, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

Today I went to a shop in downtown Lewistown called Pen and Thread and talked to a lady about spinning. It was an interesting little shop with a loom and bags of wool everywhere. I'm going to take a few lessons and hopefully be a better spinner. She also shows how to do everything with the wool so there is no need to buy roving. I sewed and painted a bit today and started to work on some things for school. I really want to start taking more photos especially of people. I never take pictures of people and I have none. This weekend I am taking everyones picture so beware and wear something pretty. :]

oh yeah this is a pink top I bought at the goodwill last week. I took it in a bit and added the white buttons for style. haha

bowling alley love, originally uploaded by cottoncupcakes.

Ok well it has been some time since an update. Not too much has been happening. I became a volunteer at an animal shelter and get to hang out with dogs on Sunday which I'm pretty excited about. I haven't heard back from my job interview which is sad. I really wanted that job and not just for the much needed paycheck. Hope everyone is having a lovely 06-06-06 day.

Today I unpacked all of my stuff from boxes and seperated into piles that slowly became divided into slightly smaller piles until I was surrounded by mini piles. It is an endless chore. I have been enjoying it a little because I really want to downsize all my belongings and own far less than I do right now. My new room is much larger than I am used to and the clost is endless. I got bored with unpacking today and made a lovely new cover for my heating pad out of cherry fabric. I also cut out some patterns in order to make some new clothes. I sewed for a little while I listened to old cds I found. I called the YMCA and it turns out that I can get a 4 month membership for only $50 which is awesome. All I need now is $50. ok so I have no idea where my camera is or my deordorant for that matter so I will post old photos Funny wool sheep my mom made years ago. Photo of my dog Bandit
I had a bad day. My face feels like someone sandpapered it and that is including my eyes. I did see a man with a fanny pack shaped like a duck. That was probably the only good thing about today.

I must say that the magic eraser is really magic. I can't believe what it can do. I would recommend it to anyone who is as messy as I am. I spilled ink everywhere today and magic eraser took care of it. I spent tonight painting and a little sewing. I finished a bunch of pins that just need a coat of sealer and they will be done. I also worked on a few more mini wood block paintings. My favorite in this bunch is the mixer.

I can't wait until summer. I just love it so. I have no idea what I'm going to be doing this summer except living at home and maybe helping to teach art camps. I just ordered a pair of velcro shoes. Someday soon watermelon will be in season and I will be one happy girl. I guess that is all I have to say. I don't have a life all I do is sew and paint and go for walks. the pouch box is filling up

Let me see...what is new with me. I have been lacking in the sleep department this week. I started to pack things in my room to kick off the super fantastic moving home activity. I have slowly but surely been making things for the show. I have been painting, learning about glues, gluing my fingers together, etc,etc. Today I purchased the wonderful E6000 industrial glue which is super cool. Very powerful stuff. My giant fluorescent light burned out in my bedroom. Since I have 12 ft ceilings I can not reach it at all. Its been driving my crazy. I only own one teeny tiny lamp to keep me from darkness and I hate the living room. I hope they come fix it tomorrow. What else. I wish I knew more people in this area. I have been bored lately. All I ever get invited to do is drink. eh. Why don't I ever meet people who enjoy board games and felt?

I had all day to do whatever because instead of going to class I went to lunch at taco bell. opps. I have been obcessed with getting chicken gorditas which really aren't that bad for you if you just get with lettuce and salsa. yummy. I have been there at least 3 times this week. I spent today making crafts and listening to french music. I have no idea what they are saying but I really love to listen to french female singers. I have so many things I still want to make for the show. I am going to spend tomorrow painting instead of sewing. Tonight JAmes and I are going to go see V for Vendetta. I hope it is good. Here is a photo a set of pouches I started today because who doesn't want to store stuff in their undies.

I want this The container is so cool. The only news I really have to share is that my hands are so sore. I have always been a nail biter. Which even I think is gross but have never been able to stop excpet for a month or so in 6th grade. Lately though it has been out of hand. I do it without thinking and whenever I am nervous. I guess its been a nerve wrecking week cause my nails are awful. I really need to find a way to stop this now. I have considered in the past getting those arcylic nails to break me of the habit cause I'm pretty sure I won't be able to bit through those. I really need to do something so maybe after my hands look a little better I will go to nail world place. Maybe I'll get the rhinestone ones or some airbrushing. hm Also I have been listening to this nonstop http://www.last.fm/user/megank19/
